main.java
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  main.java.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardInterface, MasterInterface, RulesInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
AI, BoardGrid, GameBoard
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardInterface, RulesInterface, MasterInterface

Is used to keep track of the positioning of players as well as check whether a new configuration of the board (a player move or a wall placement) is an illegal move.

Author:
Matthew Coupal
